attributes.additional_details:
The house of lords do everything they can to vote against public wishes and cost us a unnecessary fortune at this difficult time. 
So please sign lets bring them down once and for all.
attributes.background: The house of lords is costing the public a fortune and as they get paid from the public purse it should be up to the public if they remain,the country is in a very difficult financial position at present and they are surplus to requirements.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Hold a Referendum on Abolishing the House Of Lords.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332973

Abolish the House of Lords
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555591
